mapper.select: SELECT mp.prod_cd ,mp.hinban_cd ,mp.artist_cd ,mp.category_div ,mp.prod_name ,mp.disp_price ,mp.img_path ,mp.sales_start_date ,mp.sales_end_date ,ma.artist_name_kj FROM yohh.M_PRODUCT as mp INNER JOIN yohh.M_ARTIST as ma ON mp.ARTIST_CD = ma.ARTIST_CD WHERE mp.IS_DELETE = 0 ORDER BY mp.SALES_START_DATE desc LIMIT 10;
